channel.title: java on Spring Cloud
channel.description: Recent content in java on Spring Cloud

item.title: Problems encountered in migrating small microservices from Java to Kotlin and their solutions
item.description: In this article, I would like to consider the problems and their solutions, which we encountered during the migration of our small microservice from Java to Kotlin. Stack Java 11 Spring Web MVC (в рамках Spring Boot) Spring Data JPA Map Struct Lombok Maven Beginning Firstly, I would recommend anyone, who wants to put Kotlin in your project to start from tests. During this process, we configure almost all you need.
